text: Vietnam women's national volleyball team () represents Vietnam in international volleyball competitions and friendly matches. It is managed by the Volleyball Federation of Vietnam. One of their greatest success was at the 2012 AVC Cup in Kazakhstan, when the team finished fourth in the overall rankings. ==Results== ===World Championship=== * 2014 -- Did not qualify * 2018 -- Did not qualify === World Grand Prix === * 2009 -- Did not qualify * 2013 -- Did not qualify === Asian Games === * 2006 -- 7th Place * 2018 -- 6th Place === Asian Championship === * 1991 -- 8th Place * 2001 -- 7th Place * 2003 -- 6th Place * 2005 -- 8th Place * 2007 -- 7th Place * 2009 -- 7th Place * 2011 -- 7th Place * 2013 -- 6th Place * 2015 -- 5th Place * 2017 -- 5th Place ===Asian Cup=== * 2008 -- 5th Place * 2010 -- 7th Place * 2012 -- 4th Place * 2014 -- 8th Place * 2016 -- 7th Place * 2018 -- 5th Place ===SEA Games=== * 1997 -- link= Bronze medal * 2001 -- link= Silver medal * 2003 -- link= Silver medal * 2005 -- link= Silver medal * 2007 -- link= Silver medal * 2009 -- link= Silver medal * 2011 -- link= Silver medal * 2013 -- link= Silver medal * 2015 -- link= Silver medal * 2017 -- link= Bronze medal * 2019 -- link= Silver medal ===ASEAN Grand Prix=== */ 2019 -- 4th Place ===VTV Cup=== * 2004 -- 4th Place * 2005 -- link= Silver medal * 2006 -- link= Silver medal * 2007 -- 15x15px Gold medal * 2008 -- link= Bronze medal * 2009 -- 15x15px Gold medal * 2010 -- 15x15px Gold medal * 2011 -- link= Bronze medal * 2012 -- 4th Place * 2013 -- link= Silver medal * 2014 -- 15x15px Gold medal * 2015 -- 4th Place * 2016 -- link= Silver medal * 2017 -- link= Bronze medal * 2018 -- 15x15px Gold medal * 2019 -- link= Silver medal * 2020 -- Cancelled due to Covid-19 pandemic ==Current squad== * Head coach: Nguyễn Tuấn Kiệt * Assistant coaches: ** Lê Thị Hiền ** Nguyễn Trọng Linh \------------------------------ The following 14 players were called for 2019 Southeast Asian Games: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:80%; text-align:left;" |- ! # !
